name: Dice Dash (Anonymus Nemo Utiz)
description:
This is an action puzzle game, made in 1.5 days. You will spawn in a floor made out of random dices (which I created in a matrix). Watch out because you will only have 1 second on the block after that it will desapear. In addition you will have to fight with a boss and the only way that you could harm it if you step on as many blocks as you can.  The boss will get equal damage as the number of that side of the dice which you are standing at. Have fun! :]

Every audio was taken from https://freesound.org/
